directions: Blend the pineapple, sugar, pineapple juice, and basil in a blender until smooth; chill in refrigerate for 1 hour.
Place mixture in an ice cream maker and mix according to manufacturer's instructions; pour into an airtight container, and freeze 8 hours or overnight.
ingredients: 1  pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
title: Pineapple and Basil Sorbet
